description:
Experience the thrill of high-speed
snowmobile racing across wildly
varied beautiful winter vistas in a game
perfectly suited for the
Nintendo 3DSâ„¢. Challenge your
friends and foes in local multiplayer
races via Download Play. Progress
through challenging tournaments for
high scores and medals to unlock
better, faster and more fun
snowmobiles.
name: Snow Moto Racing 3D
